title: Kim Jones Parts Ways With Fendi
description: Kim Jones is parting ways with Fendi, for which he served as creative director for four years. He was first tapped as the late Karl Lagerfeld's successor in 2020, helming the Maison's haute couture, ready-to-wear and fur collections for women. Jones' collaborator, Silvia Venturini Fendi, ...Continue reading
author: Janelle Sessoms
